data.name: Mysterious Demo
data.detailed_description:
Athirits is a mythical race that once created the realm full of wonder and beaty.

For millions of years the Source has nurtured them and given them energy and knowledge in order to live and evolve and perfect the world surrounding them.

However, during the last millennium the Source has faded away. And so has the great city of Athirium.

Many brave spirits lost their lives trying to find new Source, yet no one succeeded.

Is there anything that can save Athirium?..

Game Features:


- Two forms with different play styles



- Talent tree for those who prefer variety in gameplay



- 4 difficulty levels
- Exciting challenges and boss fights



- Lore secrets and bonus challenges
- Beautiful and unique hand drawn levels and locations



Mysterious journey is waiting for you.

Explore the ancient realms, hidden behing the Gates.

Discover the ultimate truth about the origin of this world.

data.short_description: Mysterious: Dark Journey - is an action platformer, where you explore mythical lands full of enigmatic creatures and dangerours passages, hidden behind the Gates. Transform to use different abilities in order to overcome challenges that are waiting for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
